text: Abdul Karim Shah (known as Baul Abdul Karim Shah; c. 1927 – 10 June 2014) was a Bangladeshi baul singer. He was awarded Ekushey Padak in 2011 for his contribution to arts by the Government of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:2014 deaths Category:Bangladeshi male singers Category:Bangladeshi male musicians Category:People from Kushtia District Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:1927 births
title: Abdul Karim Shah
